Greetings, welcome to my portfolio! I am a double major in Economics and Applied Math/Statistics at Macalester college. I am particularly interested in Econometrics, Causal Inference, and Machine Learning/Statistics theory. Outside of school, I enjoy weightlifting, hiking, and skiing!
